name: Supermerk2
description:
'''Supermerk2''' is an Argentine [[cumbia villera]] group founded in 2003 by Óscar "Chanchín" Sotelo, at that time a [[Hawker (trade)|hawker]]. Their single "Que Calor", taken from the [[album]] "La Lata", became their first [[hit single]], being certified gold.

'''Discography'''

''La Lata'' publicado en el 2008
